Previous Next Enquire Now  SCHOLARSHIPS Scholarship based on academic performance in class X & class XII Scholarship based on national level entrance exam i.e. JEE Mains for B.TECH. , NID and UCEED for B.DES. Scholarship based on exceptional performance in co-curricular activities (sports, cultural, social services etc.) Relaxation in scholarship criteria for special cases Enquire Now  AWARDS & RECOGNITIONS Acknowledged for shaping visionaries with an aptitude to bring about transformational societal changes 30 th Ranked    TOP 50 (2021) BY 7 th Ranked    PRIVATE UNIVERSITIES: STATE RANKINGS (JUNE 2021) BY Pride of Rajasthan Award    TOP 50 (2021) BY 10 Best Universities Ranked    INDIA 2020 BY THE US-BASED “THE KNOWLEDGE REVIEW” MAGAZINE Enquire Now  Ansh Bhatia CSE (Batch 2019-2023) STUDENTS’ SPEAK "As a JKLU student, I've had an incredible experience. Thanks to my professors and mentors, I've developed a diverse set of skills, including technical knowledge, communication, leadership, and critical thinking. Serving as Deputy General Secretary of the university's Student Council for 1.5+ years allowed me to hone my leadership skills and manage a team. I'm grateful to the university's excellent faculty and management. Achieving the highest CTC in my batch, that too in the first company was impossible without the guidance of the faculty and never-ending hard work of the placement team. JKLU has a great campus life, with various clubs that offer a platform to explore one's interests." Priya Kaushik B.Tech (2019-23 Batch) STUDENTS’ SPEAK JKLU presented me with an enriching and fulfilling experience. I owe it to their interdisciplinary curriculum, mentoring faculty from top institutions and state-of-the-art labs. The university nurtured my individuality, providing exposure and wings to excel in my course. I am truly grateful for the exceptional experience, best placement, and unwavering belief in my potential. I expressed my gratitude by serving as the student council's general secretary (2021-22). I am genuinely obliged to JKLU for mentoring my dreams. Saumya Patel CSE (Batch 2019-2023) STUDENTS’ SPEAK "My time at JKLU has been transformative, offering opportunities for intellectual, social, and academic growth. Through project-based learning and supportive professors, I gained practical experience and collaborated effectively in teams. I'm thankful for exposure to emerging technologies like AI and ML, crucial in today's world. JKLU's vibrant community provided invaluable social and moral support, enriching my experience. I'm deeply grateful for the chance to expand both personally and professionally." Ritika Bhola BBA 2021-24 STUDENTS’ SPEAK “I personally believe that JKLU is a nurturing one-step destination. The university has provided me with a platform to believe in the phrase, ‘Sky's the limit’. In my first-year, I became the Vice-President of the Media club and the Event coordinator of Sabrang. I got the opportunity to do multiple internships where the corporate culture knowledge imparted by our professors helped me to earn a place on the honours list during my 1st year BBA." Ansh Bhatia CSE (Batch 2019-2023) STUDENTS’ SPEAK "As a JKLU student, I've had an incredible experience. Thanks to my professors and mentors, I've developed a diverse set of skills, including technical knowledge, communication, leadership, and critical thinking. Serving as Deputy General Secretary of the university's Student Council for 1.5+ years allowed me to hone my leadership skills and manage a team. I'm grateful to the university's excellent faculty and management. Achieving the highest CTC in my batch, that too in the first company was impossible without the guidance of the faculty and never-ending hard work of the placement team. JKLU has a great campus life, with various clubs that offer a platform to explore one's interests." Priya Kaushik B.Tech (2019-23 Batch) STUDENTS’ SPEAK JKLU presented me with an enriching and fulfilling experience. I owe it to their interdisciplinary curriculum, mentoring faculty from top institutions and state-of-the-art labs. The university nurtured my individuality, providing exposure and wings to excel in my course. I am truly grateful for the exceptional experience, best placement, and unwavering belief in my potential. I expressed my gratitude by serving as the student council's general secretary (2021-22). I am genuinely obliged to JKLU for mentoring my dreams.  Automatic alt text 
 
 
 
 
 Create alt text automatically 
 
 
 Suggests descriptions to help people who can’t see the image or when the image doesn’t load.   Learn more 
 
 
 
 
 Alt text AI model (180 MB) 
 
 Runs locally on your device so your data stays private. Required for automatic alt text.

   Next 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Mentoring Dreams   
 
 
 
  At JKLU, dreams find mentors. With globally acclaimed faculty, we offer personalized attention, knowing each student well with 1:11 faculty-student ratio . Our curriculum bridges theory and practice, emphasizing real-world projects. Embracing interdisciplinary learning, we equip students with industry-relevant skills. At JKLU, dreams aren't just imagined; they're nurtured into reality.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Read more 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
   
 
   Play Video

 University Flagship Events   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 View All Events 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 JKLU Laureate Award   
 
 
 
 JKLU Laureate Award is hosted every year to honour those who have excelled in their field as an example to those who hope to walk their path.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Design Guru Day    
 
 
 
 The annual ritual by the design community that honours global design thinkers who have significantly made a difference through their ideas and work.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Management Guru Award   
 
 
 
 Recognising leaders from the world of business for their transformative contribution towards socio-economic growth and inspiring future leaders to follow their footsteps.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Convocation and Founder's Day   
 
 
 
 The Annual Convocation and Founder's Day felicitates our students on academic achievements and completion of their degree programme.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Upcoming Events   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 April 17th– 22nd | 2023   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Jaipur Design Week   
 
 
 
 Sabrang, the flagship annual festival  of JKLU will be held on campus from 27th to 29th October, 2023. The theme of the 12th edition of the annual techno-cultural-management-design fest is “Metamorphosis” where the students will celebrate and rejoice in their transition to the outside world as young responsible adults.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 April 22nd - 23rd  | 2023   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Hack JKLU 2.0, JKLU's annual hackathon   
 
 
 
 HACK JKLU 2.0, the university’s annual hackathon event will be held from 22nd-23rd April, 2023. The event is open to all students with an interest in coding and technology. Click to know more   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Upcoming Events   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 November 23rd   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Eleventh Convocation and Founder’s Day 2023   
 
 
 
 JKLU is celebrating its eleventh Convocation and Founder’s Day on Thursday, 23rd November 2023. Click to know more   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Global Partnerships and  Academic Collaborations   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Read more 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Spotlight   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Kartavya Anadkat - BCA (2nd year)   Won the 2nd position in the FIDE World Amateur Chess Championship 2023 (OpenU2300) on November 11th in Muscat, Oman. The event saw participation from players across 64 countries. *Star Achiever* 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Deeksha Dixit - B.Tech. (CSE)   Winner of Techfest Competition in Computational Agriculture organised by IIT Mumbai 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Afreen Gani Faridi - Assistant Professor (Institute of Management)   Speaker on ‘Empowering and Securing the Futures of Tribal Children: Engendering Child Labour Legislation’. Co-speaker on Human Mobility in ‘Modern Societies: Struggle, Transformation and Critique’.  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Dr. Azeemah Saleem - Assistant Professor (CCCT)   Presented papers on ‘Impact of Visual-Audio Aids on Student Oriented Pedagogy’; ‘The Question of Democratic Values in Turkey’; ‘Social Media and the Voice of Palestinian Women Activist’. Fellow at Centre for Studies of Plural Societies. India Fellow at Islam and Liberty Network, Malaysia. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Sunandini Bansal, Paras Goyal, Ashmit, and A. Saxena   Students of B.Tech. (1st year) participated in a Robotic Techfest organised by IIT Bombay. The team was assisted by Chaitanya Aggarwal (B.Tech. 1st year) and Sukumar (B.Tech. 3rd year) 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Shamyuktha San - B.Des. (3rd year)   Winner of gold medal in Weightlifting in Udghosh at IIT Kanpur. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Click for more   
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Kartavya Anadkat - BCA (2nd year)   Won the 2nd position in the FIDE World Amateur Chess Championship 2023 (OpenU2300) on November 11th in Muscat, Oman. The event saw participation from players across 64 countries. *Star Achiever* 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Deeksha Dixit - B.Tech. (CSE)   Winner of Techfest Competition in Computational Agriculture organised by IIT Mumbai 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Dr. Azeemah Saleem - Assistant Professor (CCCT)   Presented papers on ‘Impact of Visual-Audio Aids on Student Oriented Pedagogy’; ‘The Question of Democratic Values in Turkey’; ‘Social Media and the Voice of Palestinian Women Activist’. Fellow at Centre for Studies of Plural Societies. India Fellow at Islam and Liberty Network, Malaysia. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Sunandini Bansal, Paras Goyal, Ashmit, and A. Saxena   Students of B.Tech. (1st year) participated in a Robotic Techfest organised by IIT Bombay. The team was assisted by Chaitanya Aggarwal (B.Tech. 1st year) and Sukumar (B.Tech. 3rd year)

 JK Lakshmipat University (JKLU) is supported by the 125 years old legacy of the JK organisation. At JKLU, we are passionate about building the country’s most innovative higher education institution.

 Centres and Resources 
 Research 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 At JKLU, innovation and technology come together to help create new models of a more sustainable future. A number of distinctively unique academic programmes and courses await students at the three Institutes that enable them to look beyond the ordinary and chart their way to success.

   Next 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Mentoring Dreams   
 
 
 
  At JKLU, dreams find mentors. With globally acclaimed faculty, we offer personalized attention, knowing each student well with 1:11 faculty-student ratio . Our curriculum bridges theory and practice, emphasizing real-world projects. Embracing interdisciplinary learning, we equip students with industry-relevant skills. At JKLU, dreams aren't just imagined; they're nurtured into reality.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Read more 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
   
 
   Play Video

 University Flagship Events   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 View All Events 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 JKLU Laureate Award   
 
 
 
 JKLU Laureate Award is hosted every year to honour those who have excelled in their field as an example to those who hope to walk their path.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Design Guru Day    
 
 
 
 The annual ritual by the design community that honours global design thinkers who have significantly made a difference through their ideas and work.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Management Guru Award   
 
 
 
 Recognising leaders from the world of business for their transformative contribution towards socio-economic growth and inspiring future leaders to follow their footsteps.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Convocation and Founder's Day   
 
 
 
 The Annual Convocation and Founder's Day felicitates our students on academic achievements and completion of their degree programme.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Upcoming Events   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 April 17th– 22nd | 2023   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Jaipur Design Week   
 
 
 
 Sabrang, the flagship annual festival  of JKLU will be held on campus from 27th to 29th October, 2023. The theme of the 12th edition of the annual techno-cultural-management-design fest is “Metamorphosis” where the students will celebrate and rejoice in their transition to the outside world as young responsible adults.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 April 22nd - 23rd  | 2023   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Hack JKLU 2.0, JKLU's annual hackathon   
 
 
 
 HACK JKLU 2.0, the university’s annual hackathon event will be held from 22nd-23rd April, 2023. The event is open to all students with an interest in coding and technology. Click to know more   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Upcoming Events   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 November 23rd   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Eleventh Convocation and Founder’s Day 2023   
 
 
 
 JKLU is celebrating its eleventh Convocation and Founder’s Day on Thursday, 23rd November 2023. Click to know more   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Global Partnerships and  Academic Collaborations   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Read more 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Spotlight   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Kartavya Anadkat - BCA (2nd year)   Won the 2nd position in the FIDE World Amateur Chess Championship 2023 (OpenU2300) on November 11th in Muscat, Oman. The event saw participation from players across 64 countries. *Star Achiever* 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Deeksha Dixit - B.Tech. (CSE)   Winner of Techfest Competition in Computational Agriculture organised by IIT Mumbai 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Afreen Gani Faridi - Assistant Professor (Institute of Management)   Speaker on ‘Empowering and Securing the Futures of Tribal Children: Engendering Child Labour Legislation’. Co-speaker on Human Mobility in ‘Modern Societies: Struggle, Transformation and Critique’.  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Dr. Azeemah Saleem - Assistant Professor (CCCT)   Presented papers on ‘Impact of Visual-Audio Aids on Student Oriented Pedagogy’; ‘The Question of Democratic Values in Turkey’; ‘Social Media and the Voice of Palestinian Women Activist’. Fellow at Centre for Studies of Plural Societies. India Fellow at Islam and Liberty Network, Malaysia. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Sunandini Bansal, Paras Goyal, Ashmit, and A. Saxena   Students of B.Tech. (1st year) participated in a Robotic Techfest organised by IIT Bombay. The team was assisted by Chaitanya Aggarwal (B.Tech. 1st year) and Sukumar (B.Tech. 3rd year) 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Shamyuktha San - B.Des. (3rd year)   Winner of gold medal in Weightlifting in Udghosh at IIT Kanpur. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Click for more   
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Kartavya Anadkat - BCA (2nd year)   Won the 2nd position in the FIDE World Amateur Chess Championship 2023 (OpenU2300) on November 11th in Muscat, Oman. The event saw participation from players across 64 countries. *Star Achiever* 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Deeksha Dixit - B.Tech. (CSE)   Winner of Techfest Competition in Computational Agriculture organised by IIT Mumbai 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Dr. Azeemah Saleem - Assistant Professor (CCCT)   Presented papers on ‘Impact of Visual-Audio Aids on Student Oriented Pedagogy’; ‘The Question of Democratic Values in Turkey’; ‘Social Media and the Voice of Palestinian Women Activist’. Fellow at Centre for Studies of Plural Societies. India Fellow at Islam and Liberty Network, Malaysia. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Sunandini Bansal, Paras Goyal, Ashmit, and A. Saxena   Students of B.Tech. (1st year) participated in a Robotic Techfest organised by IIT Bombay. The team was assisted by Chaitanya Aggarwal (B.Tech. 1st year) and Sukumar (B.Tech. 3rd year)

 About JK Lakshmipat University   
 
 
 
 Established in 2011 by
J.K. Organisation (JKO),
JK Lakshmipat University
(JKLU) is a pioneering
institution committed to
bridging the
industry-academia gap,
carrying forward JKO's
illustrious 125-year legacy of
nation-building. With
cutting-edge programs in
engineering, management,
and design, JKLU offers
experiential learning
opportunities and boasts the highest faculty-student ratio in
the region, accredited by
NAAC. Through strategic
partnerships, hands-on
projects, and immersive
internships, JKLU equips
students with practical skills
and real-world insights. With
a commitment to nurturing
dreams, JKLU offers
personalized guidance and
inclusive educational
opportunities, ensuring that
every student's
aspirations are fulfilled. 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Vision   
 
 
 
 To be one of India's most innovative higher education institutions. Learning is a continuous process and academic excellence a way of life. As today’s world is evolving at a fast pace, we at JKLU strongly feel the need to remain in sync with this process of constant change and transformation to make our students not only job-ready but also future ready by empowering them with new age life skills.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Mission   
 
 
 
				To realise its vision, the University will:
 
 Practice teaching that inculcates critical thinking and problem solving,   
 Pursue research that leads to innovation and enhancement of real-life applications,
 
 Offer experience that leads to all round development, and   
 Develop a culture that is strongly rooted in interdisciplinarity and learning by building, not just doing.  
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Values   
 
 
 
 Caring for people. Integrity including intellectual honesty, openness, fairness, and trust. Commitment to excellence.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 "Learning & Innovation at the Intersection of Design, Business, and Technology."   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Our Success   
 
 
 
 Our academic journey is based on intellectual stimulation and experiential learning. The acknowledgement and accolades earned along the way are testimonial to the achievements of our students, faculty, and staff.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 #A 
 
					Accredited with A grade by NAAC in year 2022				 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 #30 
 
					Ranked 30th in top 50
Private State Universities by Outlook (2021)				 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 #40 
 
					Ranked 40th in India’s Top Ranked Private Universities League Table				 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 #7 
 
					Ranked 7th in Top Private Universities: State Rankings by Education World magazine				 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 #37 
 
					Ranked 37th in top 50 Private State Universities by Outlook (2020)				 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 #9 
 
					Ranked 9th among Top Emerging Private Institutions 2016 by Times of India				 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 About JK Organisation   
 
 
 
 

J.K. Organisation is a multinational
group headquartered in India with a rich heritage of more than 125 years of operations. The Group has multi-business, multi-product and multi-location presence with its footprints in various countries across the globe with an annual turnover USD 4.5 Billion.

   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Timeline

 JK Lakshmipat University (JKLU) is supported by the 125 years old legacy of the JK organisation. At JKLU, we are passionate about building the country’s most innovative higher education institution.

 Why JKLU?

 Why JKLU?

 A ccessibility   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 B est in class faculty   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 C utting-edge resources and global outreach   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 D ynamic research opportunities   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 E ntrepreneurial attitude   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 F uture-led pedagogy   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 G rowth-oriented and placement driven   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 H olistic learning   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I ndustry-oriented approach   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 J KLU focuses on you   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Learn like the best across the world from the best in the field. We at JKLU are constantly seeking new ideas to make campus life, academic experiences, and the transition to your chosen career extraordinary and unique. And that’s what sets us apart. As today’s world is rapidly changing to cater to the work spaces and cultures of tomorrow, we acknowledge the importance of this change and continue to redefine study programmes to suit  specific interests. Pursue passion through innovation and experiential learning at JKLU. Our multi-disciplinary curriculum, project-based learning and student-centric pedagogy allow you to learn at the intersection of management, technology, and design. JKLU’s world-class infrastructure with Atal Incubation Centre, state-of-the-art labs & equipment, Maker Spaces and more, allows you to pursue your passion and become achievers, thinkers, leaders, and change makers of tomorrow. The Centre for Communication & Critical Thinking has bespoke learning programmes that are integrated with every curriculum. Top-notch faculty from esteemed institutions like IITs, NID, and IIMs makes learning here a truly enriching experience. The University’s association with the JK Organisation further amplifies excellence and best practices across the board, and equips you with 21st century skills to pursue fulfilling careers and lead enriched lives. Join us to discover a new way of learning and walk the path that opens opportunities for the  future.

 NAAC Accredited ‘A’ Grade University

 Life at JKLU   
 
 Experience life like no other   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   Menu Campus and Facilities 
 Community & Clubs 
 Sports & Recreation 
 Living 
 Health & Wellness 
 Utilities 
 Student Affairs 
 Student Council 
 Covid Safety 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Campus   
 
 
 
 When you choose JKLU, you become part of a diverse community. Our students, faculty, and staff members constitute a self-sustained ecosystem where learning is an engagement and living, a wholesome experience. We aim to provide you a safe and secure environment that forms the core of composite learning. From comfortable living spaces to a variety of recreational activities, JKLU environs offer abundant opportunities to regale, rejuvenate, and renew.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 How to get there?   
 
 
 JKLU campus is located on Mahapura-Ajmer Road at a distance of 20 km from Jaipur. Connected by a 30-minute drive from the city-centre, the university is easily accessible from Delhi and a number of major cities in Rajasthan.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Plan a visit 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Living spaces that help you learn and grow.   
 
 Facilities   
 
 
 
 Embark on your academic journey in a close-knit community where resources are shared and relationships nurtured. Be it wholesome meals and comfortable living or conveniences like transport, banking, and laundry; JKLU campus is self-sustained, inclusive, and supportive to the core.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
																							Living																							 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
																							Health and Wellness																							 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
																							Utilities																							 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
																							Living																							 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
																							Health and Wellness																							 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
																							Utilities																							 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 You are what you rejoice in.    
 
 Community & Clubs   
 
 
 
 Dull moments are rare at JKLU as a wide range of interests and activities await participation in the activity clubs managed by student groups from all across the campus.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Technical Clubs   
 
 
 Whether you are a coding freak or an ardent AI fan; JKLU technical clubs have something for you to immerse in. Choose to learn coding at Technosmart, the Coding Club or turn innovator at ARC, the Robotic Club.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Robotics Club 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Coding Club 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Competitive Programming Club 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Astronomy Club 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Knowledge Clubs   
 
 
 JKLU Knowledge Clubs help students build relationships within the community through interactive knowledge events. Here, the student members develop their personality and learn leadership skills in the process.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Photography Club 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Media Club 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Design Club 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Quiz Club 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Literary Club 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Entrepreneurial Clubs   
 
 
 In sync with JKLU spirit of entrepreneurship; Finanza, the Business and Finance Club organises workshops and training programmes to create a bridge between the industry experts and students.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Business/ Finance Club 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Community Development Club   
 
 
 We at JKLU believe in community development and the spirit of service. Our student members of the Community Development Club participate in a number of activities and events that allow them to engage in community service and develop virtues of compassion and gratitude.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Community Development Club 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Cultural Clubs   
 
 
 
 Culture is an integral part of life that is best conveyed through expression of art. At JKLU, students get to express their artistic side through participation in cultural events where they experience diversity at its best.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Dance Club 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Music Club 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Drama Club 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Sabrang   
 
 
 SABRANG, the JKLU Campus Fest is an extravaganza held in the month of February every year. The annual cultural event is eagerly awaited by one and all as it offers the students an opportunity to showcase their talents in cultural, technical, and managerial activities. The event has gained immense popularity and is only getting bigger and better with time.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Join us 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Embrace learning beyond the classroom.   
 
 Learning Resource Centre   
 
 
 
 The Learning Resource Centre at JKLU is a top-class academic reservoir of books, collections, journals, periodicals, and audio visual materials put together to support a diverse readership and foster a rich learning experience.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Visit LRC 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Why stop at academic excellence?    
 
 Sports and Recreation   
 
 
 
 At JKLU, the ways to stay fit, active, and healthy are plenty. Students can compete in the numerous inter-university sports events that intersperse the academic calendar or participate in one of the intramural activities to keep their fitness quotient high.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Know More 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Spardha   
 
 
 Spardha, the JKLU annual Sports Fest brings together the student community from across India to participate in competitive sports. The two-day event oversees a number of outdoor and indoor sports competitions held on the campus that bring out the sportsmanship and team spirit of the students.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Play on 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Intramural Events   
 
 
 Besides the periodic inter-university and annual sports events, JKLU students get to engage in a number of Intramural events that happen alongside the everyday academic schedule.    
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Be a part 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Your well-being is our priority.   
 
 Student Affairs   
 
 
 
 Whether you are a new or an existing student, you are a member of the JKLU community and your journey is important for us at the department of Student Affairs. We remain committed to each one of you and your well-being through constant engagement and interaction.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Read More 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Your experience is what matters the most.   
 
 Student Council   
 
 
 
 Our Student Council constitutes an energetic group of volunteers who represent the student body at JKLU. From assistance in planning and organising various sports, cultural and academic events to providing a bridge between the administration and the students; the student council remains involved in a number of activities on campus.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Engage

 NIRF

 NAAC Accredited ‘A’ Grade University

 Apply 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Government Recognition   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   Menu About University 
 Why JKLU? 
 Campus & Location 
 Leadership 
 Recognition 
 NAAC 
 IQAC 
 NIRF 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 JK Lakshmipat University, Jaipur, is a State Private University established through “The JK Lakshmipat University, Jaipur Act, 2011 (Act No. 19 of 2011)” by the State Legislature of Rajasthan and covered under section 2(f) of the UGC Act, 1956. The University is approved under section 10(23C) (vi) and 80G (5) of the Income Tax Act, 1961. Further, the University is recognized as Scientific and Industrial Research Organisation (SIRO) by the Department of Scientific and Industrial Research, Ministry of Science and Technology, Government of India, New Delhi.

 NAAC   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   Menu About University 
 Why JKLU? 
 Campus & Location 
 Leadership 
 Recognition 
 NAAC 
 IQAC 
 NIRF 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Proud and Honoured to be Accredited with ‘A’ Grade by NAAC   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 In April 2022, JKLU went through the process of assessment and accreditation by NAAC (National Assessment and Accreditation Council). There were 7 assessment criteria which we had to comply with in order to get a NAAC accreditation. These were: Curricular Aspects Teaching, Learning and Evaluation Research, Consultancy and Extension Infrastructure and Learning Resources Student Support and Progression Governance, Leadership and Management Innovations and Best Practices   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The expert team from NAAC critically examined JKLU on all these parameters and awarded a prestigious ’A’ Grade equivalent to a CGPA of 3.05. The grade not only reflects our hard work and perseverance, but also our aspirations and commitment to quality and excellence. ‘A’ Grade by NAAC will now propel us to work even harder in future to impart the best education to our students and ensure that the knowledge gained thereof is used to create a better tomorrow.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Self study report cycle 1 (2015 – 2020) 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Quality Mandate 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 NAAC Accreditation Results 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 AQAR 2020-21

 IQAC   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   Menu About University 
 Why JKLU? 
 Campus & Location 
 Leadership 
 Recognition 
 NAAC 
 IQAC 
 NIRF 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 As stipulated by The National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC), JK Lakshmipat University has established IQAC (Internal Quality Assurance Cell) as a quality sustenance measure.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Objective   
 
 
 
 IQAC is primarily responsible for initiating, planning, executing, and monitoring various activities that are critical for enhancing the quality of teaching-learning process and research at JKLU. It ensures that the university achieves its goal of bringing in the element of quality in ‘input, processes, and output’ in all domains.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 IQAC Members 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 JK Lakshmipat University, Jaipur invites Tender/Quotation for Supply of
Security Services.  Click for more information.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 JK Lakshmipat University (JKLU) is supported by the 125 years old legacy of the JK organisation. At JKLU, we are passionate about building the country’s most innovative higher education institution.

 Search 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Apply 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Academics   
 
 At JKLU, it's all about you.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   Menu Institutes 
 Programmes 
 Faculty 
 Curriculum Structure 
 Academic Regulations 
 Pedagogy 
 Centres and Resources 
 Research 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Our courses are collaborative and innovation-led that allow you to explore and develop deep understanding of the discipline of your choice. Backed by dedicated faculty, result-oriented methodology and innovative teaching, we are committed to imparting knowledge and self-reliance through programmes offered across the three institutes of Engineering, Management and Design where a faculty of scholars and accomplished professionals helps students translate their curiosity into accomplishment.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Institutes   
 
 
 
 Integrated learning in a holistic environment at JKLU helps students to make informed choices and build meaningful alliances. While the curious minds learn to explore and seek solutions at the Institute of Engineering and Technology, the Institute of Management allows individual ideas to evolve and create leaders of tomorrow. Creativity and immersive learning experiences at the Institute of Design offer socially responsible global design education to shape visionaries with an aptitude to bring about transformational societal changes.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 Institute of Engineering and Technology 
 
   
 Visit Institute 
 
   
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 Institute of Management 
 
   
 Visit Institute 
 
   
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 Institute of Design 
 
   
 Visit Institute 
 
   
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Programmes   
 
 
 
 At JKLU, innovation and technology come together to help create new models of a more sustainable future. A number of distinctively unique academic programmes and courses await students at the three institutes that enable them to look beyond the ordinary and chart their way to success.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Undergraduate Programmes 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Graduate Programmes 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Faculty   
 
 
 
 The mentorship of a distinguished faculty fosters students to make an impact, both in and outside the classroom. Encompassing a wide spectrum of educational qualifications and academic experience, a team of distinguished scholars continues to explore new and interactive pathways of learning at JKLU.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Search faculty by Institute -   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Institute of Engineering and Technology 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Institute of Management 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Institute of Design 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Pedagogy   
 
 
 
 Critical thinking, curiosity and logical reasoning form the core of the learning process at JKLU. ‘Learning@JKLU’, university’s new learning model is specifically designed to impart critical skills to students through technology, innovation and entrepreneurship.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Read More 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Centres and Resources   
 
 
 
 At JKLU, we integrate knowledge and research to create a self-sustained network of academic centres of excellence. These centres offer individual and collaborative opportunities to our students and teachers alike while ensuring their professional growth and success. Innovative practices and novel methods of teaching form the core of these learning centres.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Know More 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 Centre For Communication and Critical Thinking 
 
   
 Learn more 
 
   
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 Atal Incubation Centre 
 
   
 Learn more 
 
   
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 Centre for Policy Studies 
 
   
 Learn more 
 
   
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 Centre for Data Science 
 
   
 Learn more 
 
   
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 Centre for Operation Excellence 
 
   
 Learn more 
 
   
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 Makerspace 
 
   
 Learn more 
 
   
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Research   
 
 
 
 At JKLU, a culture of integration and collaboration drives the process of learning and development across the three institutes of Engineering, Management, and Design. Well-appointed labs and centres constantly engage the students and faculty in innovative research to understand and find solutions to problems, develop new ideas and create policies for a better tomorrow.

 JKLU is now accredited as an ‘A’ Grade University by NAAC   
 
 
 
 Institute of Engineering and Technology   
 
 
 
 Pushing boundaries of innovation & research   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Apply Now 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Download Brochure 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 About the Institute   
 
 
 
 Knowledge and learning through interdisciplinary approach and dynamic faculty.   
 
 
 
 We see engineering as a science that allows learning to create and bring about a change. As we strongly feel that engineering is deeply interwoven in our lives, our graduate and masters programmes in core areas of engineering are designed to allow interdisciplinary connection and collaboration.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Learn More 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Programmes   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
																							B.Tech.																							 
 
 
 Designed in sync with the latest technological advancements and innovations while preparing you to become future-ready for both jobs and academic research.   
 
 
												Read More											 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
																							M.Tech.																							 
 
 
 Composite programme that combines classroom teaching with experimentation and research through experienced faculty and state-of-the-art labs and resource centres.   
 
 
												Read More											 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
																							PhD																							 
 
 
 The PhD programme offers intensive education in Engineering and interdisciplinary research allowing you to explore innovative industrial practices and pursue the profession of your choice.   
 
 
												Read More											 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
																							B.Tech																							 
 
 
 Designed in sync with the latest technological advancements and innovations while preparing students to become future-ready for both jobs and academic research.   
 
 
											Read More										 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
																							M.Tech																							 
 
 
 Composite programme that combines classroom teaching with experimentation and research through experienced faculty and state-of-the-art labs and resource centres.   
 
 
											Read More										 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Designed to offer application based learning in computer application through a interdisciplinary curriculum that focusses on building skills for application development and IT administration.    
 
 
											Read More										 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
																							PhD																							 
 
 
 The PhD programme at JKLU offers intensive education in Engineering to help student research in interdisciplinary areas, explore innovative industrial practices and pursue professions of their choice.   
 
 
											Read More										 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
							Institute Faculty						 
 
 
 
 Sharp minds that engineer great learning experiences.   
 
 
 
 The mentorship of a distinguished faculty fosters students to make an impact, both in and outside the classroom. Encompassing a wide spectrum of educational qualifications and academic experience, a team of distinguished scholars continues to explore new and interactive pathways of learning at JKLU.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Meet the faculty

 Semester Exchange Program   
 
 
 
 JK Lakshmipat University encourages its students to consider the immense benefits of semester exchanges by offering semester exchange opportunities with premier National Universities such as IIT Gandhinagar (non-degree program of IITG), IIT Kanpur, IIT Bhilai, IIT Jammu , IIIT Delhi and IIIT Hyderabad and the International Universities such as University of Florida, Amsterdam University of Applied Sciences, Netherlands, Hanyang University, Seoul, South Korea and St. Cloud State University, USA.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Know More 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
							Institute Placements						 
 
 
 
 Where preparation meets opportunity to create success.   
 
 
 
 JKLU has achieved numerous milestones as our engineering students continue to secure placements in leading organisations and pursue promising careers in their respective chosen fields.

 JKLU is now accredited as an ‘A’ Grade University by NAAC   
 
 
 
 Institute of Management   
 
 
 
 Shaping tomorrow’s leaders & change makers   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Apply Now 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Download Brochure 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 About the Institute   
 
 
 
 The Institute of Management offers contemporary, specialised BBA programmes especially designed for students seeking international careers and study opportunities. The focus of our education is to develop leaders who have strong foundation knowledge in the core disciplines, entrepreneurial mind-set which is valued highly in employing organisations as well as own ventures and 21st century skills of critical thinking, communication, collaboration and problem solving.    
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Learn More 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Programmes   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
																							BBA																							 
 
 
 
												Read More											 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
																							PhD																							 
 
 
 
												Read More											 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Institute Faculty   
 
 
 
 Our faculty, a mix of academicians and industry professionals, is drawn from IIM’s, industry, and global institutions. We also routinely draw upon industry experts, artists to deliver guest lectures and conduct workshops for our students.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Meet the faculty 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Disciplines   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
																							BBA Banking & Fintech																							 
 
 
 The only industry-integrated programme in the fastest growing sector having industry collaborations for curriculum, internships and careers which include India’s  premier digital  bank (awarded as the most Innovative Bank of the Year), and one of the largest non-banking finance company of the country.   
 
 
											Read More										 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
																							BBA Entrepreneurship																							 
 
 
 The only programme providing an opportunity to earn a degree and be an entrepreneur at the same time. The programme includes learning at JKLU’s unique  Start-up Studio, access to Atal Incubation Centre setup with Niti Aayog, and the only BizLab™ in Rajasthan with All India Management Association.   
 
 
											Read More										 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
																							BBA Interdisciplinary																							 
 
 
 BBA Interdisciplinary is a unique customisable degree programme that gives you a foundation in the core management discipline, together with the knowledge of technology applications and design tools, along with the ability to choose your own specialization (such as marketing, finance, data analytics).   
 
 
											Read More										 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
																							Banking & Fintech																							 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
																							Entrepreneurship																							 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
																							Interdisciplinary																							 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 “The best way to predict your future is to create it.”   
 
 
 
 Abraham Lincoln

 Discipline/ Area of study – Management

Masters in International Business Development from Peter the Great, St. Petersburg Polytechnic University in 2020.

 Institute Placements   
 
 
 
 Creating opportunities today for business leaders of tomorrow.   
 
 
 
 JKLU Institute of Management is committed to its students for placements in their respective fields of choice and expertise. Regular mock interviews and career counselling sessions held through the academic year prepare our management graduates to become highly competitive and competent for lucrative jobs across industries and services.   Highest placement in 2022: 10 LPA. Regular mock interviews and career counselling sessions to prepare the students.

 A NEW 
							 
 PARADIGM 
							 IN DESIGN  
							 Apply Now 
							 ADMISSIONS 
							 Know more about us > 
							 Collaborative. Trans-disciplinary. Innovative. Technology-led. Socially responsible. Global design education at its best. 
							   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
		B.DES	 
 The 4-year degree to help you design the future. The Instiute of Design at JKLU currently offers 4 different disciplines. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Read More 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
		M.DES	 
 A 2-year modular degree for graduates of any discipline wanting to use design as an agency, tool or method of problem solving. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Read More 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Our Faculty   
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
   
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
		Jaipur Design Week	 
 
 
 
 
 
   JKLU is organising Jaipur Design Week from  17th April 2023 – 22nd April 2023,  an exemplary, experiential, and insightful Design Festival that serves the purpose of creating a constituency of Design in India.   
 
 
 
 
 For details, click here 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Epic Tale of Graduation Projects   
 
 
 
 Students of final year B.Des. and M.Des. start their final semester graduation projects with reputed companies and thought-provoking briefs. Read about a few project briefs below.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 Aashi Kapoor 
 B.Des. Product Design 

Company: Skintech Smart Innovations 

Aashi's brief is to design an innovative product which makes the process of make-up and skincare application for lip, face and eye unique from what is available. The product should be sustainable, provide a good user experience, be inclusive and pose as a new trend setter. 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 Anushree Singhvi 
 B.Des. Interdisciplinary Design 

Company: Nila House Jaipur 

Nila House has been working in the crafts and heritage sector primarily with the goals of protection and revival of crafts and improving the livelihood of craftspersons. Anushree will be handling tasks of graphic design and photography. 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 Khushi Garg 
 B.Des. Interdisciplinary Design 

Company: Creative TR 

Khushi is working on the branding, strategic and service design of a jewellery brand in Ahmedabad. This interdisciplinary project requires a variety of design skills that Khushi has learnt throughout her course. 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 Paraj Bhargava 
 B.Des. Interdisciplinary Design 

Company: Innover Labs 

Paraj is given responsibilities which are oriented around leading the design silo at Innover Labs. Paraj will also be working as a bridge between the Design and Engineering teams within the startup to streamline the process of work flow. 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 Vijay Patil 
 B.Des. Product Design 

Company: National Innovation Foundation 

Vijay is tasked with an interesting brief of designing and developing a portable coconut breaker that does not cause coconut water to spill and is easily usable. Vijay will also dive deep into the long history of humans and their favorite fruit - coconut. 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 Maitreyi Kachwaha 
 B.Des. Interdisciplinary Design 

Company: Reliance Brands Ltd. 

Reliance Brands includes some of the top brands of the world, including Muji, Georgio Armani, Hamleys, Jimmy Choo and more. Maitreyi will be collaborating with the design teams to serve to the design needs of these brands. 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 Samriddhi Jain 
 B.Des. Product Design 

Company: Samarth Life Management 

Samarth life Management's work largely centers around providing healthcare opportunities to elderly. Samriddhi will be involved in developing products to improve the living experiences of the elderly. 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 Aashi Kapoor 
 B.Des. Product Design 

Company: Skintech Smart Innovations 

Aashi's brief is to design an innovative product which makes the process of make-up and skincare application for lip, face and eye unique from what is available. The product should be sustainable, provide a good user experience, be inclusive and pose as a new trend setter. 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 Anushree Singhvi 
 B.Des. Interdisciplinary Design 

Company: Nila House Jaipur 

Nila House has been working in the crafts and heritage sector primarily with the goals of protection and revival of crafts and improving the livelihood of craftspersons. Anushree will be handling tasks of graphic design and photography. 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 Khushi Garg 
 B.Des. Interdisciplinary Design 

Company: Creative TR 

Khushi is working on the branding, strategic and service design of a jewellery brand in Ahmedabad. This interdisciplinary project requires a variety of design skills that Khushi has learnt throughout her course. 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 Paraj Bhargava 
 B.Des. Interdisciplinary Design 

Company: Innover Labs 

Paraj is given responsibilities which are oriented around leading the design silo at Innover Labs. Paraj will also be working as a bridge between the Design and Engineering teams within the startup to streamline the process of work flow. 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 Vijay Patil 
 B.Des. Product Design 

Company: National Innovation Foundation 

Vijay is tasked with an interesting brief of designing and developing a portable coconut breaker that does not cause coconut water to spill and is easily usable. Vijay will also dive deep into the long history of humans and their favorite fruit - coconut. 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 Maitreyi Kachwaha 
 B.Des. Interdisciplinary Design 

Company: Reliance Brands Ltd. 

Reliance Brands includes some of the top brands of the world, including Muji, Georgio Armani, Hamleys, Jimmy Choo and more. Maitreyi will be collaborating with the design teams to serve to the design needs of these brands. 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 Samriddhi Jain 
 B.Des. Product Design 

Company: Samarth Life Management 

Samarth life Management's work largely centers around providing healthcare opportunities to elderly. Samriddhi will be involved in developing products to improve the living experiences of the elderly. 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 Aashi Kapoor 
 B.Des. Product Design 

Company: Skintech Smart Innovations 

Aashi's brief is to design an innovative product which makes the process of make-up and skincare application for lip, face and eye unique from what is available. The product should be sustainable, provide a good user experience, be inclusive and pose as a new trend setter.

 Global Collaboration   
 
 
 
 Design students at JK Lakshmipat University have the opportunity to study a semester abroad at Edinburgh Napier University: officially The Times and The Sunday Times top modern university in Scotland and ranks 9th in Scotland.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
		Frequently Asked Questions

 Designews   
 
 
 
 Designews is the official monthly publication of the Institute of Design, JKLU and encapsulates its happenings. The publication is entirely curated by an editorial team comprising of our students.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Merchandise Store   
 
 
 
 The Design Store at JKLU is an outlet to provide the students of the Institute of Design, an opportunity to showcase their creativity and expression through the medium of art and design.

 Download Brochure

 Download brochure 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Why HSB   
 
 
 
 India’s first and only 2-year fully residential MBA with specialisation in Product Management   
 
 
 
   Globally accepted MBA degree awarded by JKLU, a UGC recognised, NAAC A grade accredited university Based on ISPMA’s global curriculum   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 The Programme 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 From the Dean's Desk   
 
 
 
 With distinguished faculty and close collaboration with industry partners, HSB is harnessing decades of expertise to inspire the next wave of Product Leaders. Our Dean, Dr. Gregory J Dunn, explains how HSB is envisioning this full stack Product Management programme within the formal management education framework   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Mr. Praveen Kumar 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Principal Director, Product,& Microsoft   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Industry Speaks

   
 
 
 
 Product Managers are central to digital transformation and innovation in any future-ready organisation. Hear our industry partners explain the evolution of ‘in-demand’ Product Leadership roles in illustrious corporate organisations and digital native businesses.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Why HSB   
 
 
 
 A unique programme integrating technology, design & business under one roof   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 Learn More 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Why HSB   
 
 
 
 Unique 3 parallel tracks running through both years   
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 learn more 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Assured summer internships   
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Dedicated Internship with startups   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1 on 1  industry mentor   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Product Management  domain specific workshops   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Global employment ready programme   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Hit the ground running as the  business leader  with deep working knowledge of product management.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 About the programme   
 
 
 
 MBA with specialisation in Product Management based on ISPMA-certified curriculum and taught by Hans-Bernd Kittlaus, Chairman of ISPMA and an ISPMA-certified trainer of repute globally. Gain business acumen and a product-centric view to lead the digital future.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 learn more 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Why do an MBA specialising in Product Management?   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 15-20%   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Annual rise in demand worldwide for PMs  Source: McKinsey   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 30%   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Increase in product manager jobs in USA Source: Burning Glass Technologies   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7 of top   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 overseas roles for Indian professionals include product management  Source: LinkedIn Emerging Jobs report   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 ₹17 Lakh   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Average starting pay for Product Managers in India Source: Ambition box   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Career path after MBA with specialisation in Product Management   
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Seeking an exclusive cohort of action-oriented individuals   
 
 
 
 A carefully designed programme to cultivate future business leaders with deep domain expertise in product.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 Talk To Us 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Eligibility   
 
 
 
 Bachelor’s Degree     
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Start Date   
 
 
 
 End of June 2024   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Location   
 
 
 
 Jaipur   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Duration   
 
 
 
 2 Year

 Admission process
   
 
 
 
 Admissions will be taken through a two-part process: online application followed by personal interview. With this process, HSB aims to   
 
 
 
   
 
 
   
 Assess qualities, personality traits, and a student’s potential, alongside their academic prowess. 
 
 
 
   
 Gather an exceptional cohort  of well-rounded students. 
 
 
 
   
 Create a diverse founding class where varied perspectives lead to richer learning. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 learn more 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Launch of Hari Shankar Singhania School of Business (HSB)   
 
 
 
 HSB was launched in a hybrid mode on 12th October 2023. The launch video is available for viewing. HSB aims to provide a contemporary and immersive business education experience to aspiring Product leaders who put products at the centre of their decisions. Our foundation cohort will begin their transformative journey in June 2024   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Globally accepted MBA degree awarded by   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 JK Lakshmipat University

 Meet the Faculty of Institute of Design   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Prof. A. Balasubramaniam   
 
 
 
 Director, Institute of Design   
 
 
 
   Bala is an alumnus of NID, Ahmedabad, and has taught across major design
institutes in the country, including NID, NIFT, and the School of Planning &
Architecture (SPA), New Delhi.   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 He is the founding Director of the Institute of Design at JKLU. He is also the
President of ADI (Association of Designers of India) for the term 2022-24.
 
 He was the Dean of IILM School of Design in Gurgaon from 2007 to 2010 and
has also been a member of the Academic Board for several design institutes,
including SPA, New Delhi and Nirma University.  He is a regular jury member
at NID, NIFT and other places. Bala has been a Design Consultant to Oxfam,
where he helped Indian artisans develop products for the European market.
He was instrumental in setting up the Prototype Initiative for Design
Excellence (PRIDE), the design division at NSIC for the Government of India
Initiative. He holds the unique experience of creating one of the first
programmes in Design based on digital delivery. 
 He has designed market-leading products as diverse as tractors and torches
for Eveready, Eicher, Usha, Hero Motors, Bajaj, NIF and UNDP. He writes on
the subject of Design in leading magazines and newspapers and on his blog.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Raj Gopal Menon   
 
 
 
 Professor & Dean, Institute of Design   
 
 
 
 Raj Gopal Menon is a graduate in Mechanical Engineering from Calicut University with a postgraduate degree in Industrial Design from IIT, Mumbai. He has more than 35 years of experience encompassing a wide array of industries and sectors such as technology, consumer products, energy, health, and design. Kaynes Technology, RAL Consumer Products, Duron Energy Pvt. Ltd., Geneva Innovations International, Perfint Health, Vital Bio Systems, Indez Designs, and his alma mater IIT, Mumbai are some of the prestigious organisations and institutions where he has significantly contributed as a design professional. Prior to joining JKLU, Raj worked as a Consultant where he was involved in medical devices prototype production for the last two years. He is an avid reader with profound interest in music, calligraphy and origami.

					Prof. Devanuj K. Balkrishan			 
 A designer with qualifications in three different domains of design namely, Architecture from IIT, Roorkee, Product Design from IIT, Delhi and Human-Computer Interaction from IIT, Bombay. He is trained to work on human problems related to habitat or usability.

 National Academic Depository (NAD) 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 modal-check 
 
 
 Anirudha Biswas 
 Anirudha Biswas is an interdisciplinary industrial designer. He is a graduate in Civil Engineering from Biju Patnaik University, Orissa and Masters in Design from National Institute of Design, Ahmedabad. He is the recipient of several international awards and is one among the first Indian designer duo to have received Red Dot award for sustainable rural innovation-led development, 2017; Red Dot nomination for innovative psychological educational tool for children, 2017; Red Dot nomination for sustainable lifestyle product design, 2018 and Red Dot nomination for innovative fashion lifestyle product, 2020. His innovative hangar designs have been nominated for A Design Award, Italy, 2018. His works on lifestyle designs in bamboo are in the permanent collection of World Bamboo Museum, Damyang, Korea. He also worked with Suta, Mumbai for their brand development in 2015. 
 In India, he has worked as the Design Manager for Godrej and Boyce Pvt. ltd. Where he was looking after research and strategy for new product development in B2C and CMF for B2B markets. He also worked at Pearl Academy as Industrial product designer, Product Design. His expertise lies in subjects related to NPD, Material Innovation, IPD, CMF etc. At Pearl, Anirudha was a mentor and guide to students of industrial design and industrial collaborative projects.

 Pedagogy   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   Menu Institutes 
 Programmes 
 Faculty 
 Curriculum Structure 
 Academic Regulations 
 Pedagogy 
 Centres and Resources 
 Research 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Novel and innovative pedagogical techniques and result-oriented teaching methodology make classroom learning an ongoing process of enrichment at JKLU. World-class facilities and resources enable you to learn, think, communicate, and introspect more. ‘Learning @ JKLU’, our redefined curriculum model offers you a holistic learning environment to become future-ready professionals and global leaders.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Reimagining Education   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
						Multidisciplinary Approach					 
 
 
						Develop perspective and awareness with discussions and seminars on economics, politics, history, social science, development and much more.					 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
						Experiential And Tech-Driven Learning					 
 
 
						Learn by doing. Apply classroom concepts to real world challenges.					 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
						No Boundaries					 
 
 
						Learn from the best facilitators, practitioners, and teaching assistants on campus.					 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
						Industry Interactions					 
 
 
						Benefit from a close and sustained dialogue with the industry. Leverage the advantages of mentorship, counselling, and work opportunities.					 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
						Autonomy And Flexibility					 
 
 
						Choose what you want to study. Take charge of your learning. Enjoy the freedom to follow your curiosity and pursue interests.					 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
						Out of classroom learning					 
 
 
						Explore JKLU Centres of excellence for out of class learning experiences.					 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 JK Lakshmipat University, Jaipur invites Tender/Quotation for Supply of
Security Services.  Click for more information.

 Centres and Resources   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   Menu About University 
 Why JKLU? 
 Campus & Location 
 Leadership 
 Recognition 
 NAAC 
 IQAC 
 NIRF 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 JKLU believes in ‘learning by doing’, a philosophy that echoes in its student-centric and interactive pedagogical techniques. A robust industry interface, fulfilling careers and International exposure for higher studies are some of the unique propositions that the university has come to be associated with in recent years.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Competitive. Committed. Collaborative.   
 
 Centres   
 
 
 
 The Centres of Excellence at JKLU make the campus an interactive and inviting space by integrating innovation and research into the life and works of students, faculty, and staff. Each Centre has a specific function and purpose to facilitate comprehensive learning and assimilation.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 Centre For Communication and Critical Thinking 
 
   
 Learn more 
 
   
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 Atal Incubation Centre 
 
   
 Learn more 
 
   
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 Centre for Policy Studies 
 
   
 Learn more 
 
   
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 Centre for Data Sciences 
 
   
 Learn more 
 
   
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 Centre for Operation Excellence 
 
   
 Learn more 
 
   
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 Maker Space 
 
   
 Learn more 
 
   
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 Management Development Centre 
 
   
 Learn more 
 
   
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Embrace learning beyond the classroom.   
 
 Learning Resource Centre   
 
 
 
 The Learning Resource Centre at JKLU is a top-class academic reservoir of books, collections, journals, periodicals, and audio visual materials put together to support a diverse readership and foster a rich learning experience.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Visit LRC 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Where enquiry and experiment go hand-in-hand.   
 
 Laboratories   
 
 
 
 The Institutes of Engineering and Technology, Management, and Design are well supported by state-of-the-art laboratories that offer skill enhancement and hands-on learning experiences in a multitude of domains.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 Computer Science and Engineering 
 
   
 Learn more 
 
   
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 Mechanical Engineering 
 
   
 Learn more 
 
   
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 Civil Engineering 
 
   
 Learn more 
 
   
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 Electrical & ELectronics Engineering 
 
   
 Learn more 
 
   
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Creating bridges between curiosity and knowledge.   
 
 Research   
 
 
 
 Research is vital for the success of any global endeavour and is the foundation of development and policies all over the world. The research draws its power from the fact that it is empirical: rather than merely theorizing about what might be effective or what could work. Quality research results are examinable, replicable, and the knowledge generated applies to real-world situations.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Explore

 Aim for 1-2 sentences that describe the subject, setting, or actions.

 This is used for ornamental images, like borders or watermarks.

 Create alt text automatically 
 
 
 Suggests descriptions to help people who can’t see the image or when the image doesn’t load.   Learn more 
 
 
 
 
 Alt text AI model (180 MB) 
 
 Runs locally on your device so your data stays private. Required for automatic alt text.

 Centres and Resources 
 Research 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Research is vital for the success of any global endeavour and is the foundation of development and policies all over the world. The research draws its power from the fact that it is empirical: rather than merely theorizing about what might be effective or what could work. Quality research results are examinable, replicable, and the knowledge generated applies to real-world situations.
