 JK Lakshmipat University, Jaipur   Code of Conduct   for Students 1   of   6 CODE OF CONDUCT FOR   STUDENTS Introduction:   A well - documented Codebook specify the standard procedures and practices of the JK Lakshmipat University ,   Jaipur (hereinafter referred to as the ‘University’) for all students enrolling with the University for pursuing varied courses. All students must know that it is incumbent upon them to abide by this Code of Ethics and Conduct (hereinafter referred to as   the ‘Code’) and the rights, responsibilities including the restrictions flowing from it” All students are requested to be well conversant with Codes, which can also be reviewed on the official website of the University. T he University’s   endeavor   by means of enforcing this Code is to pioneer and administer a student discipline process that is egalitarian, conscientious,   effectual   and   expeditious;   and   providing   a   system   which   promotes student growth through individual and collective responsibility. ” Jurisdiction:   The University shall have the jurisdiction over the conduct of its regular on rolled   registered students to take knowledge of all acts of misconduct   including   incidents of   ragging/ harassment which are taking place on the University campu s or on   Outside of University   connection with the University related activities and functions.   The University may also exercise jurisdiction over conduct which occurs in   campus violating the ideal student conduct and discipline as laid down in this manual   and also in discipline policy of the University. The   JK Lakshmipat   University , Jaipur   lays primary emphasis on the maintenance of discipline. The students are advised to strictly follow the following code of discipline: Dress Code :   The dress code for formal occasions of the University as given below: For Boys:   Boys will be required to wear white shirt, black pants / trousers with black blazer , black tie   with monogram and   formal   footwear. For Girls:   Girls will be required to wear   white shirt, black pan ts / trousers with black blazer, black tie   with monogram   and   formal   footwear. Identification Card 1.   The JK Lakshmipat University, Jaipur issues Photo Identification (ID) Cards to faculty, staff, students and other individuals to ver ify identity and to manage access to various U niversity services and facilities. Individuals are expected to maintain possession and control of their Photo Identification and related credentials at all times and to have them in their possession when on the   U niversity premises. 2.   The ID Card contains a photograph, bar code, identification, authentication and access credentials intended to provide the   U niversity with a mechanism for identity verification and electronic validation where required. 3.   The ID Card   is the property of the University and as such, it can be confiscated, deactivated and invalidated upon expiration of their intended use or upon any misuse, forgery, or alteration. 4.   Any loss must be intimated to the Director’s office at the earliest   in   writing . A duplicate ID Card will be issued on payment of the stipulated fee. 5.   Students must carry the Identity Card with them and should produce the same as and when asked for.

 Anti Ragging Committee   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   Menu About University 
 Why JKLU? 
 Campus & Location 
 Leadership 
 Recognition 
 NAAC 
 IQAC 
 NIRF 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Ragging is a criminal offence and UGC has issued a Regulations on curbing the menace of ragging in Higher Educational Institutions, 2009, in order to prohibit, prevent and eliminate the scourge of ragging in Indian Universities / Colleges / Institutions. In compliance with the UGC Regulations, JKLU has set up various Anti-Ragging measures for preventing/quelling ragging and occurrence of any uncalled for behaviour/incident. An Anti-Ragging Committee has been constituted to monitor, conduct surprise checks and redress complaints of ragging. The names of the members are given below. The student/parent may feel free to call or approach any of the members in case of any difficulty related to ragging. Dr. Lokanath Mishra, Chairperson                                 Mob: +91 9999558286   Dr. Devika Kataria, Member                                              Mob: +91 9648724741  Ms. Shraddha Bharatiya, Member                                  Mob: +91 8830426235  Ms. Aastha Gohil, Member                                                Mob: +91 9723456259  Mr. Deepak Sogani, Member                                             Mob: +91 9314072153 Mr. Prasanta Swarnakar, Member                                   Mob: +91 8094683124

 National Academic Depository 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Government of India  |  Ministry of Education 
 
 
 
 
 Skip to main content 
 Skip to navigation 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Menu 
 Home 
 
 About NAD 
 
 
 Benefits 
 
 FAQ 
 
 Contact 
 Verifier 
 Student 
 Academia 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 About  National Academic Depository 
 The vision of National Academic Depository (NAD) is born out of an initiative to provide an online store house of all academic awards. National Academic Depository (NAD) is a 24X7 online store house of all academic awards viz.certificates, diplomas, degrees, mark-sheets etc. duly digitised and lodged by academic institutions / boards / eligibility assessment bodies. NAD not only ensures easy access to and retrieval of an academic award but also validates and guarantees its authenticity and safe storage.  
 
 
 
 
 Current Institutions  on Board 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 About Digi Locker 
 Digi Locker and NAD are initiatives of Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) and Ministry of Education (MoE) respectively. The concept of National Academic Depository (NAD) is born out of an initiative by MoE to provide a 24X7 online depository to Academic institutions to store and publish their academic awards.  The digital depository not only ensures easy access to and retrieval of an academic award but also validates and guarantees its authenticity and safe storage. 
 Digi Locker is a provider of NAD services and aims at ‘Digital Empowerment’ of citizen by providing access to authentic digital documents to citizen’s digital document wallet. The issued documents in Digi Locker system are deemed to be at par with original physical documents as per Rule 9A of the Information Technology (Preservation and Retention of Information by Intermediaries providing Digital Locker facilities) Rules, 2016. 
 Maintaining academic awards in an electronic depository would provide benefit to educational institutions, students and employers by enabling online access of academic awards which will eliminate the need for persons to approach educational institutions for obtaining transcripts of such awards for verification. It would also eliminate fraudulent practices such as forging of awards, by facilitating online verification thereof and maintains the authenticity, integrity and confidentiality of the award. 
 It aspires to make the vision of Digital Academic awards for every Indian a reality. 
   DigiLocker NAD https://nad.digilocker.gov.in

 UGC Secretary Letter (May-2023) 
 Advisory from the Secretary UGC regarding ABC 
  विषय:डिजिलॉकर प्लेटफॉर्म के माध्यम से प्रस्तुत की गई डिग्री, अंक-तालिका और अन्य शैक्षणिक दस्तावेजों की स्वीकृति के संबंध में।  
 ABC Letter regarding Implementation of Academic Bank of Credits (ABC) for credit mobility between Higher Education Institutions (HEIs)

  UGC Letter regarding Acceptance of Degree, Mark-sheet and other educational documents presented through the DigiLocker platform (January-2022)

 Why have I been blocked? 
 This website is using a security service to protect itself from online attacks. The action you just performed triggered the security solution. There are several actions that could trigger this block including submitting a certain word or phrase, a SQL command or malformed data. 
 
 
 What can I do to resolve this? 
 You can email the site owner to let them know you were blocked. Please include what you were doing when this page came up and the Cloudflare Ray ID found at the bottom of this page.

 NAAC Accredited ‘A’ Grade University

 Pedagogy   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   Menu Institutes 
 Programmes 
 Faculty 
 Curriculum Structure 
 Academic Regulations 
 Pedagogy 
 Centres and Resources 
 Research 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Novel and innovative pedagogical techniques and result-oriented teaching methodology make classroom learning an ongoing process of enrichment at JKLU. World-class facilities and resources enable you to learn, think, communicate, and introspect more. ‘Learning @ JKLU’, our redefined curriculum model offers you a holistic learning environment to become future-ready professionals and global leaders.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Reimagining Education   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
						Multidisciplinary Approach					 
 
 
						Develop perspective and awareness with discussions and seminars on economics, politics, history, social science, development and much more.					 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
						Experiential And Tech-Driven Learning					 
 
 
						Learn by doing. Apply classroom concepts to real world challenges.					 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
						No Boundaries					 
 
 
						Learn from the best facilitators, practitioners, and teaching assistants on campus.					 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
						Industry Interactions					 
 
 
						Benefit from a close and sustained dialogue with the industry. Leverage the advantages of mentorship, counselling, and work opportunities.					 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
						Autonomy And Flexibility					 
 
 
						Choose what you want to study. Take charge of your learning. Enjoy the freedom to follow your curiosity and pursue interests.					 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
						Out of classroom learning					 
 
 
						Explore JKLU Centres of excellence for out of class learning experiences.					 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 JK Lakshmipat University, Jaipur invites Tender/Quotation for Supply of
Security Services.  Click for more information.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 JK Lakshmipat University (JKLU) is supported by the 125 years old legacy of the JK organisation. At JKLU, we are passionate about building the country’s most innovative higher education institution.

 JK Lakshmipat University @JKLUJaipur • 1.2K subscribers • 299 videos At JK Lakshmipat University (JKLU), we mentor dreams beyond just an education. JKLU was established in 2011, and is a part of 125 years of the JK Organization’s legacy. At JKLU, we recognize that every student has a dream to fulfil and to help them achieve that dream, we handpick the best faculty from top universities in India and abroad to become their life-long mentors. They walk with them through every step of their journey with a commitment that extends beyond a student’s time at JKLU. We prioritize having the highest 1:11 faculty-student ratio, interdisciplinary curriculum, Projects based learning and global opportunities, ensuring that our students are closer to achieving all of their dreams. Our experiential learning approach not only enhances their problem-solving skills but provides mentorship from industry professionals. With a range of world-class courses in Design, Engineering and Management, JKLU has one focused vision – Mentoring Dreams.  ...more ...more jklu.edu.in Subscribe

 JKLU || Where Every Dream Finds a Mentor 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 • 
 
 
 
 
 • 
 93,757 views 
 8 months ago 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 A place where every dream discovers a mentor and a university where budding minds are guided every day by renowned faculty from top institutions like IIT, NID and many more. Where every student’s progress is meticulously monitored. What’s more, with an interdisciplinary curriculum, project based learning and highest faculty student ratio of  1:11 , we provide students with the ideal platform to actualize all of their career dreams. Come be a part of this tribe of dreamers and mentors at JKLU. Admissions open for Management, Design and Engineering. Apply Now:  https://bit.ly/42I9EMK 
 #JKLU   #MentoringDreams   #Education   #Design   #Management   #Engineering   #Admissions   #AdmissionsOpen   #IIT   #NID   #collegeadmissions   #TopUniversity   #BestInstitute   #Design   #University   #Opportunities   #ApplyNow

 Careers   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   Menu Institutes 
 Programmes 
 Faculty 
 Pedagogy 
 Centres and Resources 
 Research 
 University Events 
 Blogs 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   As one of India’s most innovative higher education institutions, we possess an interdisciplinary character across our three Institutes of Engineering, Management, and Design along with novel pedagogy and global partnerships to offer the best education to our students. Our renowned faculty and competent staff further make the process of learning for the young minds extremely rewarding and stimulating.   At JKLU, we strive to build rewarding careers through excellence and long-term associations. If you believe in our mission of redefining education and making a difference, we would like to invite you to talk to us.   If this is not what you are looking for, do you know someone who would suit the role and be interested in exploring ideas and opportunities? Feel free to share our details via  careers@jklu.edu.in   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
					Academic Positions				 
 
 
				Explore							 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
					Staff Positions				 
 
 
				Explore

   JKLU organises numerous events where experts from a multitude of fields come together to participate in intellectual exchange and knowledge enhancement. The seminars, conferences, talks, and felicitation ceremonies held through the year keep our students engaged and informed.

 A NEW 
							 
 PARADIGM 
							 IN DESIGN  
							 Apply Now 
							 ADMISSIONS 
							 Know more about us > 
							 Collaborative. Trans-disciplinary. Innovative. Technology-led. Socially responsible. Global design education at its best. 
							   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
		B.DES	 
 The 4-year degree to help you design the future. The Instiute of Design at JKLU currently offers 4 different disciplines. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Read More 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
		M.DES	 
 A 2-year modular degree for graduates of any discipline wanting to use design as an agency, tool or method of problem solving. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Read More 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Our Faculty   
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
   
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
		Jaipur Design Week	 
 
 
 
 
 
   JKLU is organising Jaipur Design Week from  17th April 2023 – 22nd April 2023,  an exemplary, experiential, and insightful Design Festival that serves the purpose of creating a constituency of Design in India.   
 
 
 
 
 For details, click here 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Epic Tale of Graduation Projects   
 
 
 
 Students of final year B.Des. and M.Des. start their final semester graduation projects with reputed companies and thought-provoking briefs. Read about a few project briefs below.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 Aashi Kapoor 
 B.Des. Product Design 

Company: Skintech Smart Innovations 

Aashi's brief is to design an innovative product which makes the process of make-up and skincare application for lip, face and eye unique from what is available. The product should be sustainable, provide a good user experience, be inclusive and pose as a new trend setter. 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 Anushree Singhvi 
 B.Des. Interdisciplinary Design 

Company: Nila House Jaipur 

Nila House has been working in the crafts and heritage sector primarily with the goals of protection and revival of crafts and improving the livelihood of craftspersons. Anushree will be handling tasks of graphic design and photography. 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 Khushi Garg 
 B.Des. Interdisciplinary Design 

Company: Creative TR 

Khushi is working on the branding, strategic and service design of a jewellery brand in Ahmedabad. This interdisciplinary project requires a variety of design skills that Khushi has learnt throughout her course. 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 Paraj Bhargava 
 B.Des. Interdisciplinary Design 

Company: Innover Labs 

Paraj is given responsibilities which are oriented around leading the design silo at Innover Labs. Paraj will also be working as a bridge between the Design and Engineering teams within the startup to streamline the process of work flow. 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 Vijay Patil 
 B.Des. Product Design 

Company: National Innovation Foundation 

Vijay is tasked with an interesting brief of designing and developing a portable coconut breaker that does not cause coconut water to spill and is easily usable. Vijay will also dive deep into the long history of humans and their favorite fruit - coconut. 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 Maitreyi Kachwaha 
 B.Des. Interdisciplinary Design 

Company: Reliance Brands Ltd. 

Reliance Brands includes some of the top brands of the world, including Muji, Georgio Armani, Hamleys, Jimmy Choo and more. Maitreyi will be collaborating with the design teams to serve to the design needs of these brands. 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 Samriddhi Jain 
 B.Des. Product Design 

Company: Samarth Life Management 

Samarth life Management's work largely centers around providing healthcare opportunities to elderly. Samriddhi will be involved in developing products to improve the living experiences of the elderly. 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 Aashi Kapoor 
 B.Des. Product Design 

Company: Skintech Smart Innovations 

Aashi's brief is to design an innovative product which makes the process of make-up and skincare application for lip, face and eye unique from what is available. The product should be sustainable, provide a good user experience, be inclusive and pose as a new trend setter. 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 Anushree Singhvi 
 B.Des. Interdisciplinary Design 

Company: Nila House Jaipur 

Nila House has been working in the crafts and heritage sector primarily with the goals of protection and revival of crafts and improving the livelihood of craftspersons. Anushree will be handling tasks of graphic design and photography. 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 Khushi Garg 
 B.Des. Interdisciplinary Design 

Company: Creative TR 

Khushi is working on the branding, strategic and service design of a jewellery brand in Ahmedabad. This interdisciplinary project requires a variety of design skills that Khushi has learnt throughout her course. 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 Paraj Bhargava 
 B.Des. Interdisciplinary Design 

Company: Innover Labs

 Global Collaboration   
 
 
 
 Design students at JK Lakshmipat University have the opportunity to study a semester abroad at Edinburgh Napier University: officially The Times and The Sunday Times top modern university in Scotland and ranks 9th in Scotland.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
		Frequently Asked Questions	 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Click here 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Designews   
 
 
 
 Designews is the official monthly publication of the Institute of Design, JKLU and encapsulates its happenings. The publication is entirely curated by an editorial team comprising of our students.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Merchandise Store   
 
 
 
 The Design Store at JKLU is an outlet to provide the students of the Institute of Design, an opportunity to showcase their creativity and expression through the medium of art and design.

  JK Lakshmipat University   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 JK Lakshmipat University (JKLU) is supported by the 125 years old legacy of the JK organisation. At JKLU, we are passionate about building the country’s most innovative higher education institution

 Terms and Conditions   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 All the terms and conditions must be read very carefully. If you use the website(s), it implies that you agree to abide by all the terms and conditions prescribed by the JK Lakshmipat University. By using the website(s), you accept that this will form a legally binding agreement between you and JK Lakshmipat University. All information displayed on www.jklu.edu.in and another website (s) maintained by the JK Lakshmipat University is meant for general information. Visitors may download the information available on the website(s) for non-commercial, personal use only and no part of the information, either in whole or part, shall be printed, distributed, transmitted, modified, displayed or otherwise reproduced without prior written permission of JK Lakshmipat University. JK Lakshmipat University reserves the right to make changes, extend or partly/completely delete any material/content on the website(s) and all other information including the offers, if any, without notice. No responsibility will be accepted by the JK Lakshmipat University for damage or loss or any kind of hardships or expense encountered by its visitors for such changes, additions, deletions, omissions or errors, no matter how they are caused. Every effort is made to keep the website(s) up and running smoothly. However, JK Lakshmipat University takes no responsibility for and will not be liable for the website(s) being temporarily unavailable due to technical issues beyond its control. JK Lakshmipat University may share information about the visitors and/or users of its website(s) to communicate with the concerned visitors. JK Lakshmipat University may at any time modify the Terms of Use without any prior notification. You can access the latest version of the Terms of Use at any given time. You should regularly review the Terms of Use. Visitors of our website(s) hereby agree to indemnify JK Lakshmipat University, its management, officers, employees, information providers and other persons or entities associated with the JK Lakshmipat University harmless for any claims, losses or damages resulting from the breach of these terms or relying upon or use of its website(s) as well as any links to or from other sites or other resources. This agreement is governed and construed in accordance with the Laws of Union of India. You hereby irrevocably consent to the exclusive jurisdiction and venue of courts in Jaipur, District Jaipur, Rajasthan, India in all disputes arising out of or relating to the use of the website(s).

 Anti Ragging Committee   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   Menu About University 
 Why JKLU? 
 Campus & Location 
 Leadership 
 Recognition 
 NAAC 
 IQAC 
 NIRF 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Ragging is a criminal offence and UGC has issued a Regulations on curbing the menace of ragging in Higher Educational Institutions, 2009, in order to prohibit, prevent and eliminate the scourge of ragging in Indian Universities / Colleges / Institutions. In compliance with the UGC Regulations, JKLU has set up various Anti-Ragging measures for preventing/quelling ragging and occurrence of any uncalled for behaviour/incident. An Anti-Ragging Committee has been constituted to monitor, conduct surprise checks and redress complaints of ragging. The names of the members are given below. The student/parent may feel free to call or approach any of the members in case of any difficulty related to ragging. Dr. Lokanath Mishra, Chairperson                                 Mob: +91 9999558286   Dr. Devika Kataria, Member                                              Mob: +91 9648724741  Ms. Shraddha Bharatiya, Member                                  Mob: +91 8830426235  Ms. Aastha Gohil, Member                                                Mob: +91 9723456259  Mr. Deepak Sogani, Member                                             Mob: +91 9314072153 Mr. Prasanta Swarnakar, Member                                   Mob: +91 8094683124

 POSH Internal Complaint Committee   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   Menu About University 
 Why JKLU? 
 Campus & Location 
 Leadership 
 Recognition 
 NAAC 
 IQAC 
 NIRF 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 JK Lakshmipat University is dedicated to fostering a safe and supportive environment where staff, faculty, and students can work collaboratively without fear of violence, harassment, exploitation, or intimidation. This commitment extends to all forms of gender violence, sexual harassment, and discrimination based on sex or gender. In alignment with the Sexual Harassment of Women at Workplace (Prevention, Prohibition, and Redressal) Act, 2013, the university has established the POSH Internal Complaint Committee. The primary aim of this committee is to establish guidelines for protection against sexual harassment, ensure the fundamental right to work with dignity, and effectively address and resolve complaints related to such issues. Committee Members: Dr. S. Taruna,  , Presiding Officer:    +91-9414042566 Ms. Anjali Suneja , Co-Founder & Certified POSH Trainer, Hivesure Infosolutions, Jaipur and External Member Dr. Kshitiz Verma , Member:  +91-9462503825 Mr. Amitanshu R. Shrivastav , Member:  +91-8290595700 Ms. Sweety Srivastava , Member:  +91-9694096021 Ms. Priya Kaushik , Member:  +91-8302515709 Ms. Payal Kedia , IM Research Scholar, Member Ms. Anshita Kanthed , Student (2021BTecho19), Member For more information or to report an incident, please contact any of the above members. POSH-ICC Office Order :  View Now

 Research 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 At JKLU, innovation and technology come together to help create new models of a more sustainable future. A number of distinctively unique academic programmes and courses await students at the three Institutes that enable them to look beyond the ordinary and chart their way to success.
